title: Watashi No Oshi Wa Akuyaku Reijou. Maid's Kitchen
alternative_title: 私の推しは悪役令嬢。メイドキッチン ; I'm in Love with the Villainess: Maid's Kitchen ; I Favor the Villainess: Maid's Kitchen
status: 私の推しは悪役令嬢。メイドキッチン ; I'm in Love with the Villainess: Maid's Kitchen ; I Favor the Villainess: Maid's Kitchen
description:
Description :
        An "I'm in Love with the Villainess" official spin-off! A cooking comedy in which two maids, Rei and Rene, are busy making sweets for the villainess Claire!

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 3: Sea Bream Carpaccio Pasta And Shaved Ice
